speaker: Locker Room
lines: You find benches and hooks lining the wall.
You wash your face in a bucket of cold water.
Handwraps hang drying above the bench.
'Breathe now' is carved into the door.
A fighter nods and wishes you luck as he passes.
The bell sounds close from the tunnel.
You clench and unclench your hands to warm up.

choices.text: Borrow a charm left on a hook.

give_item.name: Luck Tie
give_item.description: A knot that holds when you do

choices.text: Sit a minute and learn the room's breath (mana).
